crisis.name: Great Depression in US
crisis.politicalChanges: New Deal, Increased Size of Government, creation of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC)
crisis.culturalChanges: Generaton that lived through the Great Depression stayed frugal, wary of banks, and suspicious of the stock market

crisis.name: Banqiao Dam Collapsed in China
crisis.politicalChanges: Chinese government focused on surveillance and repair of reservoir dams
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Repair and maintenance of old dams

crisis.name: Texas Drought
crisis.environmentalImpact: Agricultural failure, Extremely depleted fresh water reservoirs, wildfires

crisis.name: Libyan Civil War
crisis.politicalChanges: Overthrow of Gaddafi Government. Installation of National Transitional Council.

crisis.name: Hindenburg Disaster
crisis.environmentalImpact: No more hydrogen used as fuel
crisis.politicalChanges: Marked the end of the airship era; End of passenger Zeppelin Transportation
crisis.regulatoryChanges: Change of hydrogen fuel type for air transportation

org.name: Works Progress Administration
org.foundingMission: Increase the purchasing power of persons on relief by employing them on useful projects.
org.majorEvents: Construction of 116,000 buildings, 78,000 bridges, 651,000 miles of road and improvement of 800 airports, in addition to the Federal Art Project, the Federal Writers' Project, and the Federal Theatre Project.

org.name: People's Liberation Army
org.foundingMission: Consolidate the ruling status of the Communist Party
org.majorEvents: Chinese Civil War Against Kuomintang as Chinese Red Army Vietnam War Control of Hong Kong and Macau's Military Defense

org.name: Central Texas Water Coalition
org.foundingMission: To conserve fresh water sources in central Texas

org.name: Brigada de Topos de Tlatelolco
org.foundingMission: Help the victims of the Mexico City Earthquake

org.name: NATO
org.majorEvents: Bosnia and Herzegovina intervention, Kosovo intervention, Afghanistan War, Iraq training mission, gulf of Aden anti-piracy, Libya intervention

org.name: U.S. Marine Corps
org.foundingMission: Provide power projection from the sea.

org.name: UNICEF
org.foundingMission: To provide emergency food and healthcare to children in countries that had been devastated by World War II
org.majorEvents: Trick-or-Treat Box, Cartoons for Children's Rights, Girl Stars

wayToHelpPair.wayToHelp: Tribute to the people who died
